item.title: Legal Filing: Smartmatic Was Hemorrhaging Cash Long Before 2020 Election Controversy
item.description: Customers rejected Smartmatic for reasons unrelated to Fox. For example, the filing said, Smartmatic’s equipment was not certified.

item.title: Don’t Blame Pro-Lifers For Medical Malpractice Or Risky Abortion Drugs
item.description: Every pro-life law, without exception, contains provisions that allow for emergency medical intervention to save a mother’s life.

item.title: Disney’s New Abu Dhabi Park Trades Americana For Globalism
item.description: By giving in to the West-hating, slave labor-fueled, globalist agenda, Disney has cannibalized all the things that once made it great.

item.title: The Left’s Outcry Over South African Refugees Exposes Their Anti-White Bigotry
item.description: All the moral talk of giving justice to the persecuted, helping the helpless, liberating the oppressed — it only ever goes one way.

item.title: Will Trump’s Free-Market Drug Pricing Solution Cut Out Greedy Middlemen?
item.description: An executive order instructs the HHS secretary to negotiate with drug manufacturers so that Americans pay the same low prices that others do.
